title: Is intelligence lost? If so, how do I find it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Interesting question Jimmie. I find that intelligence is rarely lost. Brain damage, both physical, chemical, or even emotional could certainly lead to that loss. What I think you may have meant was, knowledge lost. That is fairly common. Usually due to memory. in my experience, if I forgot, I probably haven,t used it in a while, and don’t really need it. If you need it you will be able to find a more up do date version.
If you have looked under your bed and in your closets, and it is not there, then you never had it, nor will ever find it, bc it is genetic, innate, inherited from one’s parents
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Jimmie Perry III
